passives.name: Timeless
passives.effects: This item gains 10 bonus health, 20 bonus mana, and 3 ability power every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of 100 bonus health, 200 bonus mana, and 30 ability power. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18).

passives.name: Eternity
passives.effects: Restore mana equal to 10% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and heal for an amount equal to 25% of mana spent, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.
